Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using (JsEngine js = new JsEngine()) {                  for (int i=0 ; i < 10 ; i++) {                      js.SetVariable("a"' new Simple { N = i' S = (i*10).ToString() });                      Console.WriteLine(js.Execute("a.N+' '+a.S"));                  }                  Console.WriteLine(js.Execute("a.N+' '+a.X"));              }
